args.news_item: New Drug Approval Boosts Pharma Stocks

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'HealthNews.get_latest_news', 'description': 'Get the latest news in a specific category.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'category', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the category of news, e.g., health, technology, finance'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'news_list', 'description': 'a list of latest news items, each item includes title, summary, and source'}]}, {'name': 'StockMarket.analyze_impact', 'description': 'Analyze the impact of specific news on the stock market.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'news_item', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the news item to analyze'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'impact_analysis', 'description': 'the analysis of the impact on the stock market'}]}, {'name': 'IndustryComparison.compare_opportunities', 'description': 'Compare investment opportunities across different industries.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'industry_list', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'a list of industries to compare'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'comparison_result', 'description': 'the comparison result of investment opportunities'}]}, {'name': 'InvestmentAdvisor.provide_recommendations', 'description': 'Provide investment recommendations based on the latest news and analysis.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'news_analysis', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the latest news and analysis to base recommendations on'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'recommendations', 'description': 'the investment recommendations'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我是一名投资顾问，正在寻找A股市场的医疗健康机会。首先，我需要获取最新的医疗健康动态。接着，分析这些动态对A股市场的影响。然后，比较不同行业的医疗健康机会。最后，提供一些基于医疗健康动态的投资建议。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取最新的医疗健康动态
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'category'的值是什么?

{'news_list': [{'title': 'New Drug Approval Boosts Pharma Stocks', 'summary': 'A new drug approval by the FDA has significantly boosted the stocks of several pharmaceutical companies in the A股市场.', 'source': 'Financial Times'}, {'title': 'Healthcare Reform Announced', 'summary': 'The government has announced a new healthcare reform plan that is expected to impact the A股 market.', 'source': 'China Daily'}]}
